data.description:
Galactic Vanguard: Starship Skirmish places you at the helm of the most cutting-edge starfighter the Cosmos Exchange has ever engineered. In this breathtaking virtual reality experience, you’ll engage in high-stakes battles for control over the Orion Expanse, a volatile region on the fringes of known space. Defend the Cosmos Exchange’s groundbreaking jump-drive technology against relentless insurgents from the Orion Rebellion, all while climbing the ranks to achieve glory and wealth.

Utilize intuitive gaze-tracking to target enemies with precision, unleashing devastating Pulse Laser fire or locking on for a crushing Meteor Missile strike. As you complete daring missions, you’ll unlock powerful new weapons and upgrades, enhancing your combat prowess.

Uncover hidden secrets in this remote area of the galaxy, where every victory brings you closer to unraveling the mysteries of the Orion Expanse. Welcome to Galactic Vanguard: Starship Skirmish — a place where fortune favors the bold, and every battle could be your last.


    Game modes
Single User
